name: Fireflies
description: Fireflies is a First Person Psychological Adventure. The core mechanics revolves around exploration, survival from the enemy and a bit puzzle solving elements added to it. You open drawers, doors, inspect objects, unravel the mysteries of the unknown, meet interesting characters.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64 bit or above Processor: 1.80GHz Processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Video card with 512MB of VRAM Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64 bit or above Processor: 2.40GHz Quad Core Processor Memory: 12 GB RAM Graphics: Video card with 2GB of VRAM Storage: 2 GB available space
